txt.en: 'Ausma must be in here if she went after Dushtalbúk. I hope you're ready for a fight.'
Stand by with the Scout Trio
'Did you really know we were going to come for you?'
'[placeholder], free Ausma from that ice! We'll keep these hobgoblins busy!'
'I am a little banged up, but I'll live.'
'I'll say this, dwarf: you almost had me. But I think you've bitten off more than you can chew!'
'Of course! I knew you wouldn't let me down.'
The scouts Kyrstig, Molkha, and Klúso have stormed the hobgoblin fortress Shakhajât to rescue their master, Ausma. But it is unclear if they are too late, or if their help is needed at all.
'You made a lot of noise coming through the fort, allowing me to get close to Dushtalbúk unseen.'
Ausma is frozen in a block of ice!
'But my intention was for you to arrive just in time to witness the killing blow to the Warlord, not for you to free me from his trap.'
'It ended up an instructive moment anyway, didn't it?'
Help Ausma while the Trio fights the hobgoblins!
The plan to rescue Ausma begins with Kyrstig.
Ausma is frozen in a block of ice!
'I know who you are, Scout-master. You failed to kill Gorgar, and you failed to kill me! Hah, some assassin you are!'
'Come on, let's get back to camp. I need some time to lick my wounds and wallow in my failure.'
